Question
========
Fill in the blanks:

i. The standard error will be ... for a larger sample.
ii. The standard error is the standard deviation of the ... .

Answerlist
----------
* i: smaller, ii: parameter.
* i: larger, ii: parameter.
* i: smaller, ii: sample statistic.
* i: larger, ii: sample statistic.
